#summary Old-style CvSparseMat

= Reference =

Structure CvSparseMat is replaced by the more robust and more efficient SparseMat class. 

|| *OpenCV* || *PyOpenCV* ||
|| CvSparseMat || SparseMat ||
|| cvCreateSparseMat || SparseMat's constructors ||
|| CvSparseNode || SparseMat::Node ||
|| CvSparseNodeIterator || SparseMatIterator, SparseMarConstIterator ||
|| cvReleaseSparseMat || no need to invoke but if you insist: SparseMat.release ||
|| cvCloneSparseMat || SparseMat.clone ||
|| cvInitSparseMatIterator, cvGetNextSparseNode || (to be implemented) ||
